page.title: 04SHOPPING
page.content: We interviewed 131 people about their shopping patterns. 104 did their basic shopping in a supermarket outside the village, the rest locally. Most people bought milk locally and many bought meat,bakery goods,confectionery and fruit and vegetables in the village. We asked the local shopkeepers what sold best and here are some of the answers.In the bakers most people still bought white bread although many bought health loaves.Our favourite cake is a pineapple one which has icing,cream,pineapple and pastry yum!The children's favourite comics were Dandy,Playhour and Bunty.The Glasgow Herald and Daily Record the most popular papers and most of our mothers bought Womans Own,Woman's Weekly or Peoples Friend.
